Meteara: The operation I intend to do is very precarious. We will 
charge the field generator with a part of our power because of the 
likely size of the sphere. Its present capacities are limited. Also, I 
will program it so that only one of us can disarm it.

As they worked their way up the cave, the path seemed to grow 
brighter, as if there was a light source somewhere...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: all right so maybe it isn't fresh air but it is air.
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He nods and transforms into a good sized red bird.  His wings 
seem to 
> shimmer in the dim cave emitting an eerie light.  He then perches on 
Horn's 
> back while Horn follows Meteara.
